languages.text: {n}Магос обрывает сам себя, когда вид-скрины один за другим начинают стабилизироваться. Вместо бешено бегущих строк на зеленом фоне возникают стабильные изображения или размеренно текущие рапорты о статусе. Только один-единственный экран необъяснимо остается красным.{/n}

{n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Магос обрывает сам себя, когда вид-скрины один за другим начинают стабилизироваться. Вместо бешено бегущих строк на зеленом фоне возникают стабильные изображения или размеренно текущие рапорты о статусе. Только один-единственный экран необъяснимо остается красным.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

{n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

{n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

{n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡下一句话被憋了回去，他看到视讯屏幕上的图像一个接一个地稳定下来。原本在绿色背景上狂奔的字符串，被稳定的图像与不断定期更新的状态报告所取代。只有一个视讯屏幕依然是莫名其妙的红色。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡下一句话被憋了回去，他看到视讯屏幕上的图像一个接一个地稳定下来。原本在绿色背景上狂奔的字符串，被稳定的图像与不断定期更新的状态报告所取代。只有一个视讯屏幕依然是莫名其妙的红色。{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルの次の発声は、スクリーンが次々と安定し始めるのを見て、合成されぬものとなっていった。緑色の背景を疾走する記号の羅列が、安定した画像や定期的に更新されるステータスレポートに置き換えられていく。ただ1つだけ、赤いモニターが残されていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの次の発声は、スクリーンが次々と安定し始めるのを見て、合成されぬものとなっていった。緑色の背景を疾走する弦が、安定した画像や定期的に更新されるステータスレポートに置き換えられていく。ただ1つだけ、赤いモニターが残されていた。{/n}
{n}パスカルの次の発声は、スクリーンが次々と安定し始めるのを見て、合成されぬものとなっていった。緑色の背景を疾走する記号の羅列が、安定した画像や定期的に更新されるステータスレポートに置き換えられていく。ただ1つだけ、赤いモニターが残されていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqals nächste Vokalisierung bleibt ungesagt, als er sieht, wie sich die Vid-Bildschirme der Reihe nach stabilisieren. Die rasenden Zeichenreihen auf dem grünen Hintergrund werden ersetzt durch stabile Bilder oder sich regelmäßig aktualisierende Statusberichte. Nur ein Monitor bleibt unerklärlicherweise rot.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals nächste Vokalisierung bleibt ungesagt, als er sieht, wie sich die Vid-Bildschirme der Reihe nach stabilisieren. Die rasenden Zeichenreihen auf dem grünen Hintergrund werden ersetzt durch stabile Bilder oder sich regelmäßig aktualisierende Statusberichte. Nur ein Monitor bleibt unerklärlicherweise rot.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La vocalisation suivante de Pasqal n'est pas synthétisée lorsqu'il aperçoit les écrans se stabiliser les uns après les autres. Peu à peu, les flots incessants de données sur fond vert laissent place à des images stables ou des rapports de situation mis à jour en temps réel. Seul un moniteur reste inexplicablement au rouge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La vocalisation suivante de Pasqal n'est pas synthétisée lorsqu'il aperçoit les écrans se stabiliser les uns après les autres. Peu à peu, les flots incessants de données sur fond vert laissent place à des images stables ou des rapports de situation mis à jour en temps réel. Seul un moniteur reste inexplicablement au rouge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La siguiente vocalización de Pasqal se queda sin sintetizar cuando ve que las videopantallas comienzan a estabilizarse una a una. Las líneas que galopaban desbocadas sobre el fondo verde han quedado sustituidas por imágenes estables e informes de situación con actualizaciones regulares. Solo un monitor permanece inexplicablemente teñido de rojo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La siguiente vocalización de Pasqal se queda sin sintetizar cuando ve que las videopantallas comienzan a estabilizarse una a una. Las líneas que galopaban desbocadas sobre el fondo verde han quedado sustituidas por imágenes estables e informes de situación con actualizaciones regulares. Solo un monitor permanece inexplicablemente teñido de rojo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Video ekranlarının birbiri ardına stabilize olmaya başladığını gören Pasqal'ın sentezlenmiş sesi kesiliveriyor. Yeşil arka planlarda çılgınca hareket eden diziler, yerini stabil görsellere veya düzenli bir şekilde güncellenen durum raporlarına bırakıyor. Yalnızca tek bir monitör sebebi anlaşılmaz bir şekilde kırmızı kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's next vocalisation goes unsynthesised as he sees the vid-screens begin to stabilise one after another. The strings frenetically galloping across the green background are replaced with stable images or regularly updating status reports. Only one monitor remains inexplicably red.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Video ekranlarının birbiri ardına stabilize olduğunu gören Pasqal'dan çıkan bir sonraki ses, sentezlenmemiş bir şekilde çıkıyor. Yeşil arka planlarda çılgınca hareket eden diziler, yerini stabil görsellere veya düzenli bir şekilde güncellenen durum raporlarına bırakıyor. Yalnızca tek bir monitör sebebi anlaşılmaz bir şekilde kırmızı olarak kalıyor.{/n}
